extension.description:
Asynchronous Goolge analytics allows for a faster loading Google Analytics code and tracking. For more information please read - http://code.google.com/apis/analytics/docs/tracking/asyncTracking.html
Please enable and configure this plugin in the plugin manager. Read the documentation at: http://www.pbwebdev.com.au/blog/asynchronous-google-analytics-plugin-for-joomla

field.name: code
field.label: Google Analytics Web Property ID.
field.description: e.g. UA-12345-67. This code can be found in your Google Analytics account. Your site will not be tracked unless this code is entered.
